name: Spooky Horde
description:
A horde of ghosts is invading the cemetery!

Their number is growing more and more!

How to play

Fast! Click on the ghosts before they reach the stone coffin in the middle!

Controls

Mouse left button. Possibly on a ghost.

Jam

Unfortunatly I was able to work just 1 day on the game (the jam is 2 days) so the final game is not as polished as I wanted, expecially VFX and SFX are missing. Also had to cut on types of enemies because of time with respect to the initial plan. 

Music

"Ghost" by Tim Beek (timbeek.com)
